name: Super Marble Mystery
description:
Super Marble Mystery is a simple game but very funny and so many challenge. Accuracy, marble lines, fast thinking, and reflex are all important to win this marbles classic game.Fire colored balls to make sets of three or more, prevent balls from falling into the hole.
Game Features:
Never-ending fun with more than 100+ unique levels and updating.
Marbles classic and many challenging levels
Amazing and attractive power ups and boosters.
Bombs, arrow and other interesting props are available.
